greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of the reduced fraction A158620(n)/A158621(n).
comment: A158620(n) = Product_{k=2..n} (k^3-1). A158621(n) = Product_{k=2..n} (k^3+1). A158622(n) is the numerator of the reduced fraction A158620(n)/A158621(n). A158623(n) is the denominator of the reduced fraction A158620(n)/A158621(n). The reduced fractions are 7/9, 13/18, 7/10, 31/45, 43/63, 19/28, 73/108, 91/135, 37/55, 133/198, ...
formula: Denominator of (Product_{k=2..n} (k^3-1)) / Product_{k=2..n} (k^3+1) = denominator of Product_{k=2..n} A068601(k)/A001093(k).
results.author: _Jonathan Vos Post_, Mar 23 2009
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 27 2009
